channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Press a button and this SSD will self-destruct with all your data
item.description: TeamGroup has announced a new portable SSD drive called the T-Create Expert P35S that could give you some peace of mind if you’re worried about your data falling into the wrong hands. Instead of using encryption to lock everything behind a password or biometric security, the P35S has a single button that initiates a self-destruct. […]

item.title: I tested loads of mini PCs this year - and these are 16 of my favorites with up to $600 off for Black Friday so far
item.description: Having tested and reviewed some great mini machines this year, I've tracked down some of my favorite models with big discounts ahead of Black Friday.

item.title: The First iPhone 18 Pro Leaks Are Already Here
item.description: There's also news on the iPhone 17e that's expected to launch in the spring.

item.title: The 36 best gift ideas for mom this holiday season
item.description: Your mom deserves the best, and we're going to help you get them something special. The right gift can make family or friend time more valuable, after all, or it can greatly enrich time spent alone. If your mom says that she has all that she needs, don't take her word for it and show […]

item.title: Sony’s PlayStation Portal just got a rare discount for Black Friday
item.description: Deals on Sony’s PlayStation 5 are much more common than those on its PlayStation Portal, the handheld that can remotely stream games from the console via Wi-Fi. But for Black Friday, the Portal just got its first major discount to around $178.99 ($21 off) at Amazon, Walmart, and Best Buy. Additionally, you can save up […]

item.title: 'They nailed – in my humble opinion – the look of Mr. 3,' says One Piece actor David Dastmalchian
item.description: David Dastmalchian is ready for his turn as Mr. 3 in One Piece season 2 on Netflix.

item.title: Google Gemini 3 has dropped – here are 6 prompts that show what it can do
item.description: From agentic planning to interactive visual layouts, these prompts show how to tap into Gemini 3’s biggest upgrades.

item.title: CrowdStrike fires ‘suspicious insider’ who passed information to hackers
item.description: Cybersecurity giant CrowdStrike denied it had been hacked following claims from a hacker group, which leaked screenshots from inside CrowdStrike's network.

item.title: There's a massive Black Friday Lego sale at Amazon – here are 21 deals I'd buy from $6.99
item.description: From epic Star Wars sets to Disney, Botanicals, Creator 3-in-1s, and even an Advent Calendar in between, Amazon is discounting Lego sets by more than 40% for Black Friday, and you can get an excellent Lego for as little as $6.99.

item.title: Should AI moderate online hate speech?
item.description: New research has found that AI-powered content moderation systems from Google, OpenAI, Anthropic, and DeepSeek don’t always come to the same conclusions about bad language on the internet. New research has found that AI-powered content moderation systems from Google, OpenAI, Anthropic, and DeepSeek don’t always come to the same conclusions about bad language on the internet....

item.title: These Beats Headphones Are Marked Down to $150 for Black Friday
item.description: You can save big on the colorful and bass-forward Beats Studio Pro.

item.title: Google says hackers stole data from 200 companies following Gainsight breach
item.description: Notorious hacking collective Scattered Lapsus$ Hunters takes credit for the breach that affected Salesforce customers’ data, and said it is planning another extortion campaign.

item.title: ‘Jungle Cruise 2’ Has Gone Over the Falls, According to Its Stars
item.description: Dwayne Johnson and Emily Blunt don't think a rumored sequel to the 2021 film is going to happen.

item.title: Trump is drafting an executive order to stop state-level AI regulation. Here’s what to know
item.description: While the draft executive order could change, here’s what to know about states’ AI regulations and what Trump is proposing. President Donald Trump is considering pressuring states to stop regulating artificial intelligence in a draft executive order obtained Thursday by The Associated Press, as some in Congress also consider whether to temporarily block states from regulating AI....

item.title: X begins rolling out the ‘About this account’ feature to users’ profiles
item.description: The feature will show where users are based, how they're connected to X, and how many times they've changed their username.

item.description: Score hundreds off the new Pixel 10 range, or snag a discounted Pixel Watch 4 or Pixel Buds.

item.title: Kids in China Are Using Bots and Engagement Hacks to Look More Popular on Their Smartwatches
item.description: In China, parents are buying smartwatches for children as young as 5, connecting them to a digital world that blends socializing with fierce competition.

item.title: Who is AI nostalgia slop even for?
item.description: There has been a recent deluge of generative AI videos featuring uncannily fresh-faced teens waxing nostalgic about how much better the world was during the '80s and '90s. As the AI youths smize and show off their period-specific haircuts, the clips cut to dreamlike footage of sun-drenched cul-de-sacs and vintage cars while songs like "Everybody […]...

item.title: What a bargain! This 5TB portable HDD has hardware encryption, free Dropbox backup and data recovery services - I'm definitely adding it to my basket for Black Friday
item.description: 5TB Seagate One Touch portable HDD gets a solid discount for Black Friday at Amazon and Best Buy.

item.title: You can now ask the Gemini app if an image was made by AI, thanks to Google’s SynthID tool
item.description: Google has made it easier for Gemini to spot fake AI images, but does it work for all pictures?

item.title: Layoffs across sectors are raising worker anxiety. These companies have recently cut jobs
item.description: From Amazon to Target—here are some of the largest job cuts announced. It’s a tough time to be looking for a job.

item.title: Why did Apple kill ICE tracking apps? Activists are determined to find out
item.description: Apple caved to the Trump administration on ICE tracking apps. Tech freedom activists want the details. The controversy over Apple removing ICE tracking apps from its App Store isn’t over.

item.title: How to watch Pakistan A vs Sri Lanka A FREE stream – Asia Cup Rising Stars 2025 semi-final cricket from anywhere
item.description: Pakistan A vs Sri Lanka is the fiercest rivalry in cricket, and arguably sport, and is unmissable – watch Asia Cup Rising Stars 2025 live streams free online and from anywhere.

item.title: Amazon is selling the M5 MacBook Pro at an all-time low price for Black Friday and I'm trying my best to resist
item.description: Score Apple's latest 14-inch MacBook Pro at an all-time low price thanks to Amazon's Black Friday sales event.

item.title: Mullvad VPN adds ultra-fast obfuscation to beat WireGuard blocking
item.description: Mullvad VPN adds Lightweight WireGuard Obfuscation (LWO), a new ultra-light obfuscation protocol designed to hide WireGuard traffic and bypass censorship with almost no speed loss.

item.title: Google Chrome is testing a big change to tabs
item.description: Google's Chrome browser is getting an upgrade in the form of vertical tabs.

item.title: Xiaomi va rendre ses voitures électriques plus sûres grâce à ces nouvelles technologies
item.description: À l'occasion du salon de Guangzhou, Xiaomi annonce renforcer la sécurité de ses voitures électriques. La marque chinoise officialise le déploiement de son système de conduite semi-autonome HAD en version améliorée, accompagné d'une refonte complète de ses aides à la conduite.

item.title: Brendan Fraser Says the Death of ‘Batgirl’ Was About Commodifying ‘Content’
item.description: The star is still just as heated about Warner Bros. canning 'Batgirl' years later, and you know what, he's right.

item.title: Trump administration plans to open new oil drilling off of California and Florida coasts, sparking bipartisan backlash
item.description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom called the proposal ‘idiotic’ while Florida representatives urged the administration to reconsider. The Trump administration announced on Thursday new oil drilling off the California and Florida coasts for the first time in decades, advancing a project that critics say could harm coastal communities and ecosystems, as President Donald Trump seeks to expand U.S. oil production....

item.title: Nintendo Switch deals are live ahead of Black Friday: Best-ever prices on games, controllers, accessories, and more
item.description: Catch the best early Black Friday Nintendo Switch deals in 2025. Get deals on controllers, storage, games, and more.
